nodes.text: Droat milk was a type of milk served from a dish. In 1 BBY, Imperial Admiral Natasi Daala began thinking of her duties aboard the DS-1 Orbital Battle Station as being about as interesting as curdled droat milk and she felt that her superior, Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin, comprehended that.
Droat milk was briefly mentioned in Death Star, a 2007 novel written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry.
